name: enhanced_audio
author: duduw
description: An enhanced version of Redbot's Audio cog, featuring interactive embeds, ephemeral responses, and full slash command support for a better music playback experience.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing enhanced_audio!

Tips:
- Use /play and other slash commands for a modern experience.
- All controls are available as slash commands (try /queue, /pause, /skip, /stop, /volume, /repeat, /shuffle, /playlist).
- For best results, make sure the Audio cog is loaded and your Lavalink server is running.
- Need help? Use /help enhanced_audio or check the README for more info!
